title: Update WhatsApp contact number and add game search functionality

requirements.summary: Update WhatsApp contact number from 918757242955 to 918757242995 in all Buy Now button links
acceptanceCriteria: All Buy Now buttons redirect to https://wa.me/918757242995
The GameCard component uses the updated WhatsApp number
No references to the old number 918757242955 remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Update the WhatsApp link in the Buy Now button from https://wa.me/918757242955 to https://wa.me/918757242995. Search for all occurrences of the old number and replace with the new number.

requirements.summary: Add search bar with icon at the top of the game catalog for real-time game name filtering
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar is prominently displayed at the top of the game catalog section
Search icon is visible within or adjacent to the search input field
Typing in the search bar filters the displayed games by matching game names
Search is case-insensitive and updates results in real-time
Clearing the search bar shows all games again

file_operations.description: Add a search input field with a search icon (using Lucide React's Search icon) at the top of the component, above the game grid. Implement useState to track the search query. Filter the games array using the search query to match game names case-insensitively before rendering. The filtered results should update in real-time as the user types. Maintain the existing horizontal scrolling layout for the filtered game rows.
